Reviews.Title: “Hotel OK, just don't leave anything behind when you check-out!”
Reviews.Author: carffion
Reviews.Content: 11 son wwe raw o2 chose hotel mainly price booked superbreak discount halifax ultimate reward visa debit card cost £55 night stay english breakfast access hotel ideal custom house dlr stop literally road comfy breakfast ok basic inhouse cafe serves superb fish chips unfortunately left mobile phone charger emailed hotel following day reply following phone call sent prepaid envelope days passed havent received shouldnt moan bearing mind price paid nights stay tend detract

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and well priced”
Reviews.Author: tosdc52
Reviews.Content: surprised relieved reading previous hotel expected welcomed joke easiest o2 helicopter checked morning remembered enjoyed dancing ice paid reasonable supplement superior criticism air conditioning safe action clean bed comfortable 5th floor traffic noise faintest whisper dlr bathroom pod style stylish cruise ships note breakfast morning ample supplies choice 3 dining choices reasonable prices choice parking available cost £10 night enjoyable experience

Reviews.Title: “Terrbile Hotel Management totally Rude”
Reviews.Author: Nick1586
Reviews.Content: booked hotel twice booked dates time originally stayed unimpressed unpleasant staff rude management forced stay time cancel volcanic dust iceland course wouldnt refund money peoples misery shame please book hotel please theyre plenty alternatives

Reviews.Title: “A cheap hotel with good access to Central London.”
Reviews.Author: nymphetamine
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 6 nights marchapril 2010 cleaned towels changed daily sheets changed 6 night stay average size tiny wc shower bed comfy complaints except shower powerless ages hair washed walls thin hear corridors loud voices people floor nights sleep night continental breakfast expected contained apples croissants rolls bread yoghourt cereales etc breakfast served nice restaurant windows bothered staff bit eager clean tables barely waited people finish example morning eating cereales held cup hand waiter finish plate bit food cultural laugh overall hotel clean stains corridor carpets didnt look dirty pub cafe downstairs nice staff averagely friendly enthusiastic rude access central london excel station bus stop road journey takes 45 minutes change line times didnt bother travelling hotel times day 1214 hour days centre feet killing week plan spending days central london dont spend time journeys recommend paying bit hotel bit closer centre

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, compact and comfortable enough.”
Reviews.Author: RedHillian
Reviews.Content: hotel fantastically located excel centre docklands closer dlr station platform compact feature modular shower unit perfectly serviceable roomy frame adjacent toilet unit bed comfortable window blackout blind curtains hotel quiet service reception helpful including recommendation local pizza delivery company happy deliver breakfast excellent hot selection actually looked tasted food decent array continental breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and fit for purpose”
Reviews.Author: Denis-and-Julie
Reviews.Content: picked bargain price using octopus travel booking 6 weeks advance hotel perfectly located excel arena convenient dlr tip centre london arrived mid saturday afternoon lucky obtain car parking spaces wouldnt fancied parking streets nearby definitely designed comfortable bathroom tight glad little recently fit beam scotty shower glad id paid continental breakfast cooked food looked horrendous

Reviews.Title: “Not the best place I've ever stayed but OK!”
Reviews.Author: LondonChills
Reviews.Content: greeted girl reception looked bored didnt premiere shocked en suite bathroom actually portaloo shower cubicle cant imagine able shower floor cheap shower curtain cheap bars soap stain toilet seat pretty clean quiet slightly cold didnt eat dont food bar nice popular hotel location opposite dlr station easy o2 jubilee line paid stay sign reception saying usually £150 little paying 60 odd refused pay price

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price!”
Reviews.Author: sidesix
Reviews.Content: hotel kept clean bathroom pod clean bad staff friendly comfortable wasnt noisy hardly heard else hotel cheap price paid happy luxury basic clean modern stay wont disappointed

HotelInfo.Name: Custom House Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 272-283 Victoria Dock Road, London E16 3BY, England
